com.scalar.dl.ledger.util

Class Argument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.dl.ledger.util.Argument

  • public class Argument
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class that formats and extracts from a contract argument. The contract argument passed to Ledger and Auditor has the following format depending on the version:

    V1 format: "{"nonce":"<nonce>","_function_ids_":['function_id1', ...],<contract arguments in JSON>}"

    V2 format: "V2<nonce><optional function IDs ('' separated)><contract arguments in a serialized JSON string format or a user-defined string format>"
